title: DDFP 617: Week 11 Recap & Week 12 Red Challenge Flag Picks
itunes:title: DDFP 617: Week 11 Recap & Week 12 Red Challenge Flag Picks
description:
Dave Dameshek is first joined by Ike Taylor to talk about the main contenders in the NFC, highlighting the Carolina Panthers and Cam Newton’s unparalleled playmaking ability (4:47). Then, Maurice Jones-Drew, Colleen Wolfe and Handsome Hank join the show to preview the three Thanksgiving games (23:02) and break down the Bills’ conundrum at the QB position (46:04). Lastly, EmmaVP reads her Week 12 "TV Guide" family movies edition game previews for the fellas and Colleen to break down and make their Red Challenge Flag picks (31:17).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
